definition: friendly/amicable/to keep up harmonious relations (with sb)
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
friendly neighboring countries/to keep up good relations with neighboring countries

sentences.english: A friendly intercourse is opened between the most remote parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 遠的兩國開始了一種親睦的邦交。

sentences.english: I hope I can get comcontainered well with you soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望能很快跟你們相處親睦起來。

sentences.english: West wind and finally show amity.
sentences.chinese: 西風和秀秀終於親睦如初。

definition: to strengthen moral ties between people/to have sexual intercourse (of a married couple)
to bring honor to one's ancestors and benefit future generations (idiom)
to pay careful attention to one's parents' funerary rites
after that, any remaining energy (idiom from Analects); time for extracurricular activities
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
